column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////The locals suggested this spot
column2: so we decided to see what's good about it. Since the place was busy
column3: we immediately voted to sit at the bar. The service there was ok. The bartender had a little too much on his plate and was rather slow making his rounds to us. The food was delicious. We had a Bloody Mary
column5: and their house deep dish pizza. Everything exceeded our expectations except for the fact that our pizza took about Â an hour to come out. That's the only reason why I can't give them 5 stars. Don't know if the bartender forgot to put the order in
column6: but the guy next to us got his pizza in about 20 minutes. You make the call
